data.description: POE Based SMTP Server with Plugin Support
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
POEST::Server is the highest-level class library that supports this
    application, called poest. The application was named poest because
    it is based on POE, and as a mail server acts as a traditional
    "post". That is, the "post" delivers mail, "poest" delivers email.
    As supporting libraries, POEST was the most logical choice.
    Alphabetically, it aligns well with POE, though does not fit under
    that namespace.
